description.translate: Get away, run away, fly away, lead me astray, to dreamer's hideaway

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Course éperdue\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Sauvez-vous, fuyez, envolez-vous,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7égarez-moi, dans la cachette du rêveur\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Get away, run away, fly away,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7lead me astray, to dreamer's hideaway\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a4 §7DAR§a3\"}"],color:12470537}}
